high.title: Failover implemented but not enabled in production
high.impact: Failover exists but won't activate without config
high.resolution: Set ENABLE_AI_FAILOVER=true and add OPENAI_API_KEY or GEMINI_API_KEY in Vercel

high.title: API credentials committed to repository
high.resolution: Rotate credentials, remove from repo, use Vercel secrets only

medium.title: Only 51% of votings have embeddings
medium.resolution: Run embedding generation after database fill completes

resolved.title: Anthropic API credits exhausted
resolved.resolution: User added credits, switched to Haiku for cost efficiency
